project.name: NFT Avatar Generator
project.current_stage: Transitioning to Hugging Face Spaces for image generation
project.objective: Generate a large batch of 100 custom NFT avatar images using Stable Diffusion

configuration.batch_size_option: Pending - can be added to app.py

next_steps.details: Deploy the Gradio interface on Hugging Face Spaces using the GitHub repo. Test single image generation functionality to confirm working setup.
Modify app.py to allow for larger batch generation of 100 images with specified prompts.
Test generation of a 100-image batch to check performance and storage management.
